column1: # derivations that will be added to DeriNet based on Etym dict derivations list
# EtymDict: "derivation" is derivation of "grandparent", but "derivation" already has parent
# DeriNet: "parent" is root of tree containing "derivation"
# => connect "parent" (parent in DeriNet of the "derivation") to "grandparent" (in etym dict "grandparent" has listed "derivation" as child)
